body:
hey everyone, i was playing the Rendezvous' and a question popped into my head id like to ask you all :)

What is your favourite Nebula map duo/trio OUT OF:

Rendezvous 1, 2, 3.
Justice 1, 2, 3
Candyland 1, 2
Senex 1, 2, 3
Amusement Park 1, 2
 What's your favourite?
body_tagged:

title: What Is Your Favourite Map Duo/Trio?

replies.body: Rendezvous, hands down. First map I ever played was the original, and while I'm not a fan of the third one, the first two are some of my favourite maps :)
replies.body_tagged: Rendezvous, hands down. First map I ever played was the original, and while I'm not a fan of the third one, the first two are some of my favourite maps :)

replies.body: haha, no surprise either, i have to agree with you to be honest :p
replies.body_tagged: haha, no surprise either, i have to agree with you to be honest :p

replies.body: My favorite is the Justice series by far, but of course I love all the McZone ones as well.
replies.body_tagged: My favorite is the Justice series by far, but of course I love all the McZone ones as well.

replies.body: Senex by far but i could for the Justice Series as well
replies.body_tagged: Senex by far but i could for the Justice Series as well

replies.body: Senex by far, followed by Rendezvous. Justice ones are rubbish
replies.body_tagged: Senex by far, followed by Rendezvous. Justice ones are rubbish

replies.body:
Gotta hand it to Rendezvous, especially the original.

Justice II and III are both excellent maps as well, the same goes for Senex.

Gotta get used to Candyland and Amusement Park maps though, as I'm alwyas on the MCZone board :P
replies.body_tagged:
Gotta hand it to Rendezvous, especially the original.

Justice II and III are both excellent maps as well, the same goes for Senex.

Gotta get used to Candyland and Amusement Park maps though, as I'm alwyas on the MCZone board :P

replies.body: I'd have to say the Rendezvous trio of maps are my favorite. Just a fun, simple map series. Simplicity isn't always a bad thing
replies.body_tagged: I'd have to say the Rendezvous trio of maps are my favorite. Just a fun, simple map series. Simplicity isn't always a bad thing

replies.body:
Picking certain ones out for my opinion:
Rushing (Easy to): Abandon Park 1
Rushing (Harder to): Rendezvous 2
Defending (Easy to): Justice 2
Defending (Harder to): Candyland 1
Most detail: Abandon Park 2
Least Detail: Rendezvous 1
Most Void: Justice 1
Least Void: Abandon Park 2
replies.body_tagged:
Picking certain ones out for my opinion:
Rushing (Easy to): Abandon Park 1
Rushing (Harder to): Rendezvous 2
Defending (Easy to): Justice 2
Defending (Harder to): Candyland 1
Most detail: Abandon Park 2
Least Detail: Rendezvous 1
Most Void: Justice 1
Least Void: Abandon Park 2

replies.body:
i agree man, thanks for that little statistic, i might actually refer to this when I'm thinking of maps i feel like rushing or defending :)
But yeah, i agree with that :)
